vocab: purr: 가르랑거리다, 기분 좋은 목소리로 말하다
sentences: I've been going on 5 km runs recently, about twice a week.
In the end, it just left me feeling frustrated.
I decided to set out on my own to conquer New York City.

today_delta.title: EBS 라디오 입이 트이는 영어 - 2.5 Life Mentor
today_delta.vocab:
stay with: 남아 있다
compliment: 칭찬, 칭찬하다
playful: 장난기 있는
have an influence on: ~에 영향을 미치다
calm: 침착한
reserved: 내성적인, 과묵한
calm and reserved: 점잖은
today_delta.sentences:
Find one good thing about your spouse every day and compliment them on it.
That's easier said than done.
We argue here and there.

message:
오늘의 영어 공부 (2026-02-05)

[오늘의 단어]
- stay with: 남아 있다
- compliment: 칭찬, 칭찬하다
- playful: 장난기 있는
- have an influence on: ~에 영향을 미치다
- calm: 침착한
- reserved: 내성적인, 과묵한
- calm and reserved: 점잖은
- avid: 열심인, 열렬한, 열망하는
- imperfect: 불완전한, 결함이 있는
- purr: 가르랑거리다, 기분 좋은 목소리로 말하다
- arithmetic: 연산, 계산
- rinse: 헹구다, 가볍게 씻다

[오늘의 문장]
- Find one good thing about your spouse every day and compliment them on it.
- That's easier said than done.
- We argue here and there.
- I've been going on 5 km runs recently, about twice a week.
- In the end, it just left me feeling frustrated.
- I decided to set out on my own to conquer New York City.
